headline: Breathable Membranes Research Report 2025
summary: The global breathable membranes market, valued at $1.74 billion in 2023, is projected to reach $3.27 billion by 2029, growing at a CAGR of approximately 11% from 2024 to 2029. Rising demand for sustainable building materials, enhanced material technology, and increasing awareness of indoor air quality drive this growth. Widely used in construction, textiles, and healthcare, breathable membranes improve energy efficiency and ventilation. The market sees segmentation by type into polyethylene, pol
